name: spo-trim-and-m365Archive-sitecollection
title: Trim fileversions and archive Site Collection using Microsoft365 Archive
shortDescription: Trim the file versions and archive the site using Microsoft 365 Archive
longDescription: This script shows how to trim the file versions to a specific level and then archive the site using Microsoft 365 Archive (a SharePoint Premium pay-as-you-go feature)

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Trim fileversions and archive Site Collection using Microsoft365 Archive

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
